Summary: The letter is a welcome message from NUS-ISS to a participant in their lifelong learning journey. NUS-ISS aims to provide the necessary skills and knowledge for professional and personal growth. The course materials are protected by copyright and are for personal use only. NUS-ISS offers a wide range of programmes in various industries, such as artificial intelligence and cybersecurity. Participants can reach out for assistance or information about their programmes. The letter is signed by Yum Hui Yuen, the Director of Executive Education & Corporate Services at NUS-ISS.
